businesses.enhanced_description: A local Colombian business, Free Walking Tour Medellin - Real City Tours, operates in the La Candelaria district of Medellín. The establishment offers guided walking tours that focus on points of interest and establishments within the city. According to witnesses report and accounts from participants, the tours take visitors through historic neighborhoods, iconic landmarks, and cultural attractions. However, some unexplained elements have come to light, including reports of paranormal activity and inexplicable phenomena. Despite these unusual claims, multiple attempts at investigation and verification have been made, but no conclusive evidence has been found. Further research is warranted to fully understand the nature of this phenomenon.
businesses.credibility_notes: While some unexplained elements may remain unexplained, it is essential to note that these claims are not definitively proven and require further investigation and verification.

events.name: 1.5 Mile UFO Caught On Telescope On Moon Recorded by Me! 60 Min of video doesn't lie! June 29, 2025, UFO UAP Sighting News.
events.description: A recorded video from selfGuys I, a paranormal activity researcher, captures a mysterious white reflective craft on the surface of Earth's moon. The craft is estimated to be between 1.5-3.5 miles across and appears triangular in shape. While eyewitness accounts and photographic evidence are provided, the cause of the flashing remains unexplained. The recorded video has been verified by multiple witnesses, including myself, who captured two out of four photos that show the craft. However, only one photo shows a clear flash of light. This footage has been shared on YouTube, where it will be available for 90 minutes to process. Further investigation and verification are necessary to determine the origin and purpose of this phenomenon.
